name: MCP Bridge
description: Bridges MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers into native OpenClaw agent tools

servers.description: MCP server definitions keyed by server name

command.description: Command to spawn the MCP server (stdio transport)

env.description: Environment variables for the server process

url.description: URL for HTTP/SSE transport (alternative to command)

toolPrefix.description: Prefix tool names with server name (e.g. ai_todo_list_tasks)

optional.description: Register tools as optional (require allowlist to enable)

servers.label: MCP Servers
servers.help: Define MCP servers to bridge into agent tools. Each server's tools become native OpenClaw tools.

optional.label: Optional Tools
optional.help: If true, tools require explicit allowlist to be available to agents.
